resources.string: I Am Home Plug-In for MessageOnTap
Automatically notify others upon arrival at home.

This app can help you automatically notify your friends when you are at home, You don\'t need to tediously type the message \"I have arrived my home\" anymore! We help you to easily set up and We do the sending work for you ! Whenever you arrived home, you will get a NOTIFICATION that ask you to send message automatically.\n\nClick anywhere to start the tutorial.
